text: Enywe abasuubila, nimuchenda khunjila ya Nyasaye, munonelesie mube nobwatoto, Ne mulaboolela ulia ubashesinjia mbu; “ Ewe sholi omusuubili tawe, khulwokhwenya ukhunyoola obulayi bwobulamu bwokhushialo shino,” ne ewa Nyasaye khuli nende omwandu omunji (kwa ghanima). Endio nilwamwali enywe khale, mana Nyasaye nabaleshela. Kho munonelesie obulayi. Toto Nyasaye ali nende obumanyi khukamukholanga
